instanceVariables.name: CurrentState
instanceVariables.desc: Current state of the button. 0 is inactive; 1 is hovered; 2 is activated.

instanceVariables.name: Locked
instanceVariables.desc: True if the button is locked. The button text won't be displayed and the button will be gray and without effect (but still clickable).

instanceVariables.name: BaseR
instanceVariables.desc: Base value of red for this button. From 0 to 255.

instanceVariables.name: BaseG
instanceVariables.desc: Base value of green for this button. From 0 to 255.

instanceVariables.name: BaseB
instanceVariables.desc: Base value of blue for this button. From 0 to 255.

instanceVariables.name: UseSelector
instanceVariables.desc: True if a selector should be displayed when hovering this button.

instanceVariables.name: InvisibleWhenLocked
instanceVariables.desc: True if this button should simply be invisible when locked instead of having a greyed out appearance.
